Read ESIOS CSVs or RDAs and transform into functional-data (fdata) objects

Source: R/esios2fdata.R
esios2fdata.Rd

Reads ESIOS CSVs or RDA files produced by esios2csv() and converts them into functional-data (fdata) objects. Supports multiple resolutions (minute-based and hourly) and handles daylight-saving anomalies by interpolating missing or duplicate intervals at the DST transition.

Usage

esios2fdata(
  var_names,
  years,
  resolution = c("1min", "5min", "10min", "15min", "30min", "hour", "1hour"),
  input_dir,
  output_dir = NULL,
  mode = c("csv", "rda"),
  verbose = FALSE
)

Arguments

var_names

Character vector of variable names (e.g. "Solar_PV_119").

years

Integer vector of years to process.

resolution

Character: one of "1min","5min","10min","15min","30min","hour","1hour"; must match the resolution used when generating CSV/RDA.

input_dir

Directory containing CSV or RDA files.

output_dir

Directory where RDA files will be saved (created if missing); if NULL, no output files are written.

mode

Character: "csv" to read CSV files, "rda" to read saved RDA objects.

verbose

Logical; if TRUE, prints progress messages.

Value

A list of class c("ldata","list") of fdata objects, named by "<var>_<suffix><year>".
